――生徒会長に連れられて、突然３人の少女が現れた。: —Three girls suddenly appeared, led by the student council president.
一応チーム名だけはどちらも知っている。\n実力的にはカオスメイデンと並ぶ各校舎の:
Just in case, I know the team name.
In terms of raw power, they were the top-class teams in each building, along with Chaos Maiden.
特にドロテア・カークランドは、\nユーロ・タワーでも最強格とされるパイロットだ。:
Especially Dorothea Kirkland.
He's the strongest pilot in Euro Tower.
ねえ、『龍宮さん』って呼ぶのもなんですし、\nちゆるちゃんでいいですか！？:
Hey, I don't want to call you Ryuugu-san,
Is Chiyuru-chan okay?!
あっ！ なんかこのフルートって人、見たことあると思ったら、\nギャルインフルエン:
Ah! I thought I'd seen this flute before, but...
Isn't that the Gal Influencer's "Fleighty"?!
わぁ！ Ｆｌ∞ｔｙのこと知ってるんですか！？ 嬉ぽよです～！\n仰るとおり、配信:
Wow! You know about Fleighty?! I'm so happy!
Like you said, I'm broadcasting! Piiice♪
では、わたくしも月ヶ瀬さんと呼ばせていただきましょう。: Well then, allow me to call you Tsukigase-san as well.
……おい、七彩。お前キャラ被ってるぞ。しかも上位互換だ。: ...Hey, Shichika. You're wearing your character. And you're ranked high.
それ、今言わないとダメな話ですの！？\nしかもなんでわたくしのほうが、下位なんで:
Is that something I have to say right now?!
And why am I in the lower ranks?!
七彩のアイデンティティが消えちゃう……\nこれからは語尾に『ナナ』って、つけてみ:
Shichisai's identity will disappear...
From now on, do you want to put 'Nana' at the end of the sentence?
こほん。――ご存じの通り、現在月ヶ瀬さんの扱いを巡って、\n学園全体が大きく揺れ:
Ahem. As you know, Tsukigase-san's current treatment is...
The entire school is shaking.
月ヶ瀬さんをより充実した研究施設に\n移すべきだという意見もあります。:
To make Tsukigase-san a more fulfilling research facility.
There is an opinion that it should be transferred.
それ、ちゆるの意思とかちゃんと考えてる訳？: Are you really thinking about what you want to do?
考えられていないので、月ヶ瀬さんを学園の外に出すという意見は\n私の方ですべて抑:
I hadn't considered it, so the opinion that Tsukigase-san would be out of the academy
I'm keeping everything under control.
ですが、彼女をシリウスシュガーではなく、\n他チームに所属させるべきという意見が:
However, I didn't want her to be Sirius Sugaru
There are strong opinions from all over that we should let them belong to another team.
こちらの意見については、私の権限でも抑え込めていない状況です。\nむしろ……私だ:
As for my opinion, even I can't suppress it.
In fact, it's more accurate to say that I'm the one who can't control myself.
どういうことですか？: What do you mean by that?
月ヶ瀬さんはシリウスシュガーに所属した状況で\nこれまで何度か危険な目に遭ってい:
Tsukigase-san was in a situation where she belonged to Sirius Sugaru
I've been in danger several times before.
その責任は許可を出した私にある……と責められておりまして。\n理事会からの圧力も:
The responsibility for that lies with me, the one who gave her permission...or so I was accused.
Due to the pressure from the board of directors, we're in quite a tight spot.
生徒会長ってのも大変なんだな。: Being the student council president must be tough.
生徒の長といっても、中間管理職のようなものですから。: He may be the leader of the students, but he's like a middle manager.
ちゆるちゃんにはうちのＬＯＣ校区で、研究するとか超アリ寄りの\nアリじゃないかっ:
Chiyuru-chan's in our LOC school district, doing research and stuff like that.
It looks like an ultra-comfortable research facility!
我々ピクシス・マスールであれば、月ヶ瀬さんをよりメイズの深層へ\n安全にご案内で:
If we were Pixis Masulu, Tsukigase-san would go deeper into the Maze.
I can guide you to safety. Safer and more reliable than any other team.
あっ、そんなこと言っちゃいます！？ フルート達だって\nちゆるちゃんを守れますけ:
Oh, are you going to say that?! Even the flutes!
I can protect Chiyuru-chan, but...! I haven't lost at all!
なるほど。つまりちゆるを引き抜きに来たわけか。: I see. In other words, she's here to pull out Chiyuru.
もちろん、転籍の決定は最終的にはご本人の意思に委ねられます。: Of course, the decision to transfer is ultimately up to the individual's own will.
ですが、『学園の大事な宝である彼女を、\nより安全な環境で管理すべき』という意見:
However, 'she, the precious treasure of the school,
It is also true that there is a strong opinion that it should be managed in a safer environment.
何それ！ 宝とか管理とか！\nちゆるのことを物か何かだと思ってんの！？:
What's that supposed to mean?! Treasures and management?!
Do you think Chiyuru is an object or something?!
そ、そうです！\nちゆるさんはシリウスシュガーの大事な仲間です……！:
Th-That's right!
Chiyuru-san is an important member of Sirius Sugaru...!
……分かった。みんなに迷惑をかけちゃったし、転校を受け入れる。\nあたしが柊にい:
...Okay. I've caused a lot of trouble for everyone, so I'll accept the transfer.
If my being in Hiiragi is enough to cause problems like this...
それは……でも、だって、仕方ないじゃない……: That's... But, but, I can't help it...
……はぁ。嫌なことは嫌だって、\n自分の口で言わないと意味ないだろ。:
...Hah. She said she didn't want to do anything bad,
There's no point if you don't say it with your own mouth.
なあ、生徒会長。ちゆるが『所属に値するチーム』であれば、\nそれでいいんだよな？:
Hey, Student Council President. If Chiyuru is a team worthy of being a member,
That's okay, right?
ええ……もちろん。彼女がメイズに出たいのならば、\nそれを守れるだけの実力を備え:
Yes... Of course. If she wants to appear in the Mays,
It would be ideal to have a team with the ability to protect it.
……そうですわね。実力で決めるのが一番だと思いますわ。: ...That's right. I think it's best to decide by force.
どっちが強いのか弱いのかはっきりさせたらぁ！: Let's make it clear who's stronger and weaker!
この展開、なんか超アゲぽよですね！ 仲間を巡ってみんなで戦う……\nフルートは―:
This development is kind of like a super-agepo! We're all fighting over our friends...
As for the flute—Treburg Integrity is super in favor!
いいでしょう。言葉ではなく、剣を持って語り合うとしましょう。\nよろしいですね？:
Very well. Let us not speak with words, but with swords.
Is that all right, Lucy?
ええ、お嬢様がそうご決断されたのであれば――: Yes, if that is your decision, Milady—
いや、もう『敵』の前で繕う必要はないな。\nてめぇらはお嬢をはじめ、あたしらピク:
No, there's no need to fix it in front of the 'enemy' anymore.
Starting with Ojou, we, Pixis Masulu, will reap it!
ふふ、良い啖呵です。さすが、わたくしのリュシー。: Haha, that's a good way to put it. That's my Lucy.
（このリュシーって人、こっちが素だったか……\nやっぱさっきからなんか視線が怖い:
(So this Lucy is the real Lucy...)
I thought her gaze was kinda scary for a while now.)
……分かりました。では、非公式戦として\n私の裁量で執り行いましょう。:
...Understood. Then let's call it an informal battle.
Let's do it at my discretion.
ルール、日程、会場については後日、改めてお知らせします。: We'll inform you of the rules, schedule, and venue at a later date.
――かくして、思いがけず非公式ＭＧ競技の開催が決まったのだった。: —And so, it was unexpectedly decided that an unofficial MG competition would be held.
その後、生徒会長達が去って――: After that, the student council president and the others left――
……ごめんね。あたしのせいで、こんなことに。: ...I'm sorry. This is all my fault.
別に。チームがナメられたら誰だってキレるし。: Not really. Anyone would snap if they underestimated the team.
わたくしも少々、腹に据えかねましたわ。\nあなたの意思を聴く前に、勝手に都合を押:
I couldn't quite stomach it myself.
Before I can hear your intentions, you're forcing me to do as you please.
しっかし、これはこれでかなり厳しいことになりそうだな。\n相手はどちらもかなりの:
Still, this is going to be pretty tough in its own way.
I've heard they're both powerful teams.
関係ないって。誰が相手だろうとぶっ飛ばせばいいんだし！: It doesn't matter. Whoever it is, we just have to beat them up!
突然響いた声に、俺達は後ろを振り返った。: We turned around at the sudden sound of her voice.
そこには、今にも泣きそうな顔でこちらを見てくる心香の姿があった。: There was Shinka, looking at me like she was about to cry.
